message: Let's split it 90/10. I think this is a fair starting point.
Let's meet in the middle, 60/40 seems fair to me.
I'm willing to go down to 55/45. This is my final offer, as inflation is making it harder for me to accept a lower share.
Since you're feeling the pinch of inflation, I'll meet you halfway on your last offer, but I still think I deserve the larger share.
